title: Family portrait
brief_description: An impression, by the late Humphrey Jennings, poet, painter and film maker, of the spirit and traditions of Britain and its people. Made in celebration of the Festival of Britain, 1951. Credits include: music by John Greenwood; photography by Martin Curtis; narration by Michael Goodliffe; music direction by conductor Muir Mathieson.
